00246    /* 
00247    * Destructor. 
00248    */
00249    template <class Interaction>
00250    DihedralPotentialImpl<Interaction>::~DihedralPotentialImpl() 
00251    {
00252       if (interactionPtr_) {
00253          delete interactionPtr_;
00254          interactionPtr_ = 0;
00255       }
00256    }

00265    /*
00266    * Read dihedral interaction parameters.
00267    */
00268    template <class Interaction>
00269    void DihedralPotentialImpl<Interaction>::readParam(std::istream& in)
00270    {
00271       readBegin(in,"DihedralPotential");
00272       bool nextIndent = false;
00273       readParamComposite(in, interaction(), nextIndent);
00274       readEnd(in);
00275    }

00281    inline double DihedralPotentialImpl<Interaction>::
00282       energy(const Vector& R1, const Vector& R2, const Vector& R3, int typeId) const
00283    {  return interaction().energy(R1, R2, R3, typeId); }

00317    /*
00318    * Increment atomic forces, without calculating energy.
00319    */
00320    template <class Interaction>
00321    void DihedralPotentialImpl<Interaction>::addForces()
00322    {  addForces(true, false);  }
00323 
00324    /*
00325    * Increment atomic forces and compute pair energy for this processor.
00326    */
00327    template <class Interaction>
00328    void DihedralPotentialImpl<Interaction>::addForces(double& energy)
00329    {  energy = addForces(true, true);  }
00330 
00331    /*
00332    * Compute total dihedral energy on all processors.
00333    */
00334    template <class Interaction>
00335    #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00336    void 
00337    DihedralPotentialImpl<Interaction>::computeEnergy(MPI::Intracomm& communicator)
00338    #else
00339    void DihedralPotentialImpl<Interaction>::computeEnergy()
00340    #endif
00341    { 
00342       double localEnergy = 0; 
00343       localEnergy = addForces(false, true); 
00344       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00345       communicator.Reduce(&localEnergy, &energy_, 1, 
00346                           MPI::DOUBLE, MPI::SUM, 0);
00347       #else
00348       energy_ = localEnergy;
00349       #endif
00350    }
00351 
00352    /*
00353    * Return total pair energy from all processors.
00354    */
00355    template <class Interaction>
00356    double DihedralPotentialImpl<Interaction>::energy()
00357    {  return energy_; } 
00358 
00359    /*
00360    * Increment atomic forces and/or pair energy (private).
00361    */
00362    template <class Interaction> double 
00363    DihedralPotentialImpl<Interaction>::addForces(bool needForce, bool needEnergy)
00364    {
00365       // Preconditions
00366       //if (!storagePtr_->isInitialized()) {
00367       //   UTIL_THROW("GroupStorage must be initialized");
00368       //}
00369 
00370       Vector dr1; // R[1] - R[0]
00371       Vector dr2; // R[2] - R[1]
00372       Vector dr3; // R[3] - R[2]
00373       Vector f1, f2, f3;
00374       double energy = 0.0;
00375       double dihedralEnergy;
00376       double fraction;
00377       GroupIterator<4> iter;
00378       Atom* atom0Ptr;
00379       Atom* atom1Ptr;
00380       Atom* atom2Ptr;
00381       Atom* atom3Ptr;
00382       int   type, isLocal0, isLocal1, isLocal2, isLocal3;
00383 
00384       storagePtr_->begin(iter);
00385       for ( ; iter.notEnd(); ++iter) {
00386          type = iter->typeId();
00387          atom0Ptr = iter->atomPtr(0);
00388          atom1Ptr = iter->atomPtr(1);
00389          atom2Ptr = iter->atomPtr(2);
00390          atom3Ptr = iter->atomPtr(3);
00391          isLocal0 = !(atom0Ptr->isGhost());
00392          isLocal1 = !(atom1Ptr->isGhost());
00393          isLocal2 = !(atom2Ptr->isGhost());
00394          isLocal3 = !(atom3Ptr->isGhost());
00395          // Calculate minimimum image separations
00396          boundaryPtr_->distanceSq(atom1Ptr->position(),
00397                                   atom0Ptr->position(), dr1);
00398          boundaryPtr_->distanceSq(atom2Ptr->position(),
00399                                   atom1Ptr->position(), dr2);
00400          boundaryPtr_->distanceSq(atom3Ptr->position(),
00401                                   atom2Ptr->position(), dr3);
00402          if (needEnergy) {
00403             dihedralEnergy = interaction().energy(dr1, dr2, dr3, type);
00404             fraction = (isLocal0 + isLocal1 + isLocal2 + isLocal3)*0.25;
00405             energy += fraction*dihedralEnergy;
00406          }
00407          if (needForce) {
00408             interaction().force(dr1, dr2, dr2, f1, f2, f3, type);
00409             if (isLocal0) {
00410                atom0Ptr->force() += f1;
00411             }
00412             if (isLocal1) {
00413                atom1Ptr->force() -= f1;
00414                atom1Ptr->force() += f2;
00415             }
00416             if (isLocal2) {
00417                atom2Ptr->force() -= f2;
00418                atom2Ptr->force() += f3;
00419             }
00420             if (isLocal3) {
00421                atom3Ptr->force() -= f3;
00422             }
00423          }
00424       }
00425       return energy;
00426    }
00427 
00428    #if 0
00429    /* 
00430    * Compute dihedral contribution to stress.
00431    */
00432    template <class Interaction>
00433    template <typename T>
00434    void DihedralPotentialImpl<Interaction>::computeStressImpl(T& stress) const
00435    {
00436       Vector dr1, dr2, f1, f2;
00437       const Atom *atom0Ptr, *atom1Ptr, *atom2Ptr;
00438 
00439       setToZero(stress);
00440 
00441       // Iterate over all dihedrals in System.
00442       storagePtr_->begin(iter);
00443       for ( ; iter.notEnd(); ++iter){
00444          atom0Ptr = &(iter->atom(0));
00445          atom1Ptr = &(iter->atom(1));
00446          atom2Ptr = &(iter->atom(2));
00447 
00448          boundary().distanceSq(atom1Ptr->position(),
00449                                atom0Ptr->position(), dr1);
00450          boundary().distanceSq(atom2Ptr->position(),
00451                                atom1Ptr->position(), dr2);
00452 
00453          // f1 -- along dr1; f2 -- along dr2.
00454          interaction().force(dr1, dr2,
00455                            f1, f2, iter->typeId());
00456 
00457          dr1 *= -1.0;
00458          dr2 *= -1.0;
00459          incrementPairStress(f1, dr1, stress);
00460          incrementPairStress(f2, dr2, stress);
00461       }
00462 
00463       stress /= boundary().volume();
00464       normalizeStress(stress);
00465    }
00466 
00467    template <class Interaction>
00468    void DihedralPotentialImpl<Interaction>::computeStress(double& stress) const
00469    {  computeStressImpl(stress); }
00470 
00471    template <class Interaction>
00472    void DihedralPotentialImpl<Interaction>::computeStress(Util::Vector& stress) 
00473         const
00474    {  computeStressImpl(stress); }
00475 
00476    template <class Interaction>
00477    void DihedralPotentialImpl<Interaction>::computeStress(Util::Tensor& stress) 
00478         const
00479    {  computeStressImpl(stress); }
00480    #endif
